description: SVG is a language for describing two-dimensional graphics in XML. SVG allows for three types of graphic objects: vector graphic shapes (e.g., paths consisting of straight lines and curves), raster graphics (raster images), and text.
name: Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) 1.1
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">svg</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
